name: Poke The Bear
description:
Antagonize an apex predator in this first-person poker. Stick it to 'em or pay the price!

Watch out if he is looking directly at you! But be careful, you might upset him anyway.

Feel the JUICE when you poke and get bit!!! 

Created in 10 days for Juice Jam II.. 

How to play: 

Click the bear as many times as you can before he bites you!

Art inspired by AlbertoV
